genresAdvancedInfo.name: nisiotika
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Nisiotika is a genre of traditional Greek music that originates from the Aegean islands. It features the use of traditional instruments such as the bouzouki, baglamas, and tsambouna. The music is characterized by its lively rhythms, upbeat melodies, and lyrics that often celebrate island life and culture. Nisiotika is an important part of Greek folk music and is popular at festivals and celebrations.
